# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -O common-services-msb-1.0.0-RC0-linux64.tar.gz https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1020/org/openo/common-services/microservice-bus/msb-core-standalone/1.0.0-RC0/msb-core-standalone-1.0.0-RC0-linux64.tar.gz
RUN tar -xf common-services-msb-1.0.0-RC0-linux64.tar.gz
RUN rm -f common-services-msb-1.0.0-RC0-linux64.tar.gz
EXPOSE 80
